label.verifyProperty: I confirm that this bike is mine and that I have the necessary documents to prove it.

security.subtileText: Your bike's security comes first! Let's start by adding its serial number

serialNumber.bodyText: Your bike's security comes first! Add your bike's serial number below. If you don't have it available right now, you can add it later.
serialNumber.SerialNumberButton: Scan serial number with the camera
serialNumber.SerialNumberExplanation: Before saving, check that the entered serial number is correct; otherwise, it will go to the incidents department.
serialNumber.title: IDENTIFY YOUR BIKE

registerBike.serialNumberInfo: Where is the serial number located?
registerBike.serialNumberInfoText: You will find the serial number on your bike's frame. Depending on the model, it can be a QR code, a barcode, or an engraved number.
registerBike.serialNumberMessage: Tell us the serial number of your bike to identify it in case of theft or loss.

registerBike.technicalSpecsSubtitle: Check everything is correct and edit what is necessary. When you finish the basic technical sheet, you can see your bike in the garage.

registerBike.verifyPropertyViewMessage: To recognize the bike as yours, we need to be sure.
registerBike.verifyPropertyViewPhotoInfo: Take a photo of the invoice, receipt, or any proof of your purchase

registerBikeInfo.content1: You can save manuals, invoices, technical information, and stay updated on news from your brand.
registerBikeInfo.content2: With just one click, you can seek help from the community and authorities and mark your bike as stolen.
registerBikeInfo.content3: Every year, bikes appear that cannot be returned because the owner is unknown. Don't let your bike be one of them!
registerBikeInfo.subtitle: Why add my bike?
registerBikeInfo.title:
Add
Bike

registerBikeTermsAndConditions.agreeWithTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions

registerBikeTermsAndConditions.swornDeclaration: Sworn declaration of truthfulness of the provided data
registerBikeTermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsContent:
By accepting this message, I declare responsibly:

1.- That I am older than {year}.

2.- That I am the legitimate and full owner of the bike I am registering in my name.

3.- The truthfulness, accuracy, and suitability of the documentation provided to prove ownership of the bike.

4.- That under my responsibility, I assume the fulfillment of the legal obligations inherent in each of these statements and release ALL IN BIKING SL from any responsibility for the service it provides according to its Terms and Conditions.

And for it to be recorded for the appropriate legal effects, I give my consent and authorize ALL IN BIKING SL to register this document with the signature and digital fingerprint of the place, date, and device through which it is formalized.

label.relevantInfoExplanation: The more information you provide, the more likely the Community can help you recover your bike. Don't forget to include details like where it was locked, where you were during the theft, and the physical appearance of the suspect.
label.stealDescription: Where was the bike when it was stolen?

subtitle.aboutBikeTitle: Select the bike you want to report as stolen
subtitle.report: Enter theft data to generate a report and alert relevant authorities

view.verifyUserToReport:
For your safety and the safety of the Community, you need to verify your identity to submit an alert.

By certifying your identity, we can ensure that the Community helps you more securely and quickly.

report.WelcomeInfo: To complete the alert, you will need to: Check your identity, verify ownership, requirement

responsibleStatementFirst.subtitle:
At All in Biking, we take the ownership of your bike very seriously, and that's why we want to identify it as yours. For this, we need you to assure us that it is so, which is why it is essential to accept the following responsible statement.

If you have already entered the serial number in the previous steps, great! If you haven't, make sure to do so as soon as possible to fully identify your bike.
responsibleStatementFirst.title:
Responsible
Statement

responsibleStatementSecond.content:
By accepting this message, I declare responsibly:

1.- That I am older than {year}.

2.- That I am the legitimate and full owner of the bike I am registering in my name.

3.- The truthfulness, accuracy, and suitability of the documentation provided to prove ownership of the bike.

4 .- That under my responsibility, I assume the fulfillment of the legal obligations inherent in each of these statements and release ALL IN BIKING SL from any responsibility for the service it provides according to its
responsibleStatementSecond.content2:
.

And for it to be recorded for the appropriate legal effects, I give my consent and authorize ALL IN BIKING SL to register this document with the signature and digital fingerprint of the place, date, and device through which it is formalized.
responsibleStatementSecond.modalContent: Your bike is already registered. Now you can access the details of your bike and complete its technical details.
responsibleStatementSecond.modalImagesText: Remember to upload photos of your bike to make it recognizable.
responsibleStatementSecond.modalSearchContent: Your bike is already registered. Now you can enter the year and model; with this data, we will automatically fill in its components according to the manufacturer.
responsibleStatementSecond.title: Declaration of truthfulness of the provided data

creation.createRideSubTitle: You can manually create a ride or also import a route

subtitles.private: Only users invited by the creator of the ride can participate.
subtitles.public: Any user can participate in a public ride.

creation.helperText: Paste the link to your ride here or describe it

invalid.alertMessageWeather: The indicated date is distant, and the forecast may vary.
invalid.distanceDays: Weather cannot be forecasted beyond 8 days
invalid.genericError: An error occurred, please try again
invalid.minTimeFromNow: You cannot create a ride in the past
invalid.noFutureEvent: There must be more than one hour before starting the ride.
invalid.scheduleError: You cannot create two simultaneous rides.

invite.failedMessage: Some invitations could not be sent. Do you want to try again?

creation.onlyUserVerifiedModalText: If you activate this option, only verified profiles can register for the created ride. This will provide you with peace of mind when sharing the ride with users who are perfectly identified within the application, even if they are not your friends.
creation.sendConfirmationModalText: Tired of feeling like a plant waiting for your friends? Don't worry; we have the perfect solution! Activate this function and force your friends to confirm their attendance one hour before leaving. This way, you can ensure that you will have company and won't feel like a lonely cactus in the desert!
creation.title: Create ride

edition.infoText: All changes made to the time, meeting place, and end of route will be notified to attendees to keep them informed.
edition.title: Edit ride

invalid.genericError: An error occurred, please try again
invalid.minDistanceMajorThanMaxDistance: The minimum distance cannot exceed the maximum distance
invalid.minDurationMajorThanMaxDuration: The minimum duration cannot exceed the maximum duration

filters.noResultsText: There are no rides that meet the applied filters
filters.title: Ride Filters

rideConfirmation.content: Don't forget to check the details of the route, the difficulty level, your physical capacity, the condition of your equipment, and the weather. By joining this ride, you declare that you are aware of the traffic safety rules in your country and take responsibility for the consequences of your actions during the ride according to the App's Terms and Conditions. Remember that you participate voluntarily and can leave the ride if you think it may cause any problems to you or others.
rideConfirmation.errorMessage: You must accept the terms and conditions before continuing
rideConfirmation.notShowCheck: I don't want to receive this message again.
rideConfirmation.termsCheck: I understand the Terms and Conditions of All In Biking
rideConfirmation.title: Ride Responsibly!

errorDoubleBooking.modalContent: It is not possible to participate in two rides simultaneously. Please check your upcoming rides and make sure to cancel or reschedule any ride that has the same time range as this one before trying to join again.

rideDetail.fullRideContent: Wow! This ride is currently full. Someone may drop out, so stay tuned.
rideDetail.noOtherTrackDataSubtitle: We couldn't receive the data properly from the apps linked by this user.
rideDetail.notEnoughTracksDataInfoSubtitle: To compare the data, at least two users with linked apps who participated in this ride are needed. Please make sure to link your app and encourage other users to do the same for a better understanding of user performance on this route.
rideDetail.notEnoughTracksDataSubtitle: Currently, there is not enough data available to show comparative statistics among members of the ride.
rideDetail.noTrackDataSubtitle: We have no information about the performance on the ride because there are no linked apps or we couldn't receive their data. We recommend checking your linked apps for a better experience.
rideDetail.onlyForVerifiedModalContent: Only verified profiles can sign up for this ride. To sign up, you must first verify your profile.
rideDetail.onlyVerifiedModalText: Only verified profiles can sign up for this ride. To sign up, you must first verify your profile.

The support of all Community members to recover stolen bicycles is vital.

Check the alert, and if it's the same bicycle you've checked, help the user recover it.

With your help, we will drastically reduce the theft rate.

Contribute to the Community!
#safeTogether

We have just launched the application and are working hard to improve it and implement new features.

We will read and take into account each of your comments on how we could improve because, in the end, All In Biking is for you!
